verses.verse: In the <S%H7969>third<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3566>Cyrus<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia<s%> a <S%H1697>message<s%> was <S%H1540>revealed<s%> to <S%H1840>Daniel,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> was <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> <S%H1095>Belteshazzar;<s%> and the <S%H1697>message<s%> was <S%H571>true<s%> and [one of] <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6635>conflict,<s%> but he <S%H995>understood<s%> the <S%H1697>message<s%> and had an <S%H998>understanding<s%> of the <S%H4758>vision.<s%>
In <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> I, <S%H1840>Daniel,<s%> had <S%H1961>been<s%> <S%H56>mourning<s%> for <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3117>entire<s%> <S%H7620>weeks.<s%>

I did not <S%H398>eat<s%> any <S%H9143>tasty<s%> <S%H3899>food,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> did <S%H1320>meat<s%> or <S%H3196>wine<s%> <S%H935>enter<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> did I <S%H5480>use<s%> any <S%H5480>ointment<s%> at all, <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H3117>entire<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7620>weeks<s%> were <S%H4390>completed.<s%>

And on the twenty-fourth <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month,<s%> while I was by the <S%H3027>bank<s%> of the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5104>river,<s%> that is, the <S%H2313>Tigris,<s%>

I <S%H5375>lifted<s%> my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> and <S%H7200>looked,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> there was a <S%H259>certain<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H3847>dressed<s%> in <S%H906>linen,<s%> whose <S%H4975>waist<s%> was <S%H2296>girded<s%> with [a belt of] <S%H3800>pure<s%> <S%H3800>gold<s%> of <S%H210>Uphaz.<s%>

His <S%H1472>body<s%> also was like <S%H8658>beryl,<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> had the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of <S%H1300>lightning,<s%> his <S%H5869>eyes<s%> were like <S%H784>flaming<s%> <S%H3940>torches,<s%> his <S%H2220>arms<s%> and <S%H4772>feet<s%> like the <S%H5869>gleam<s%> of <S%H7044>polished<s%> <S%H5178>bronze,<s%> and the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of his <S%H1697>words<s%> like the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of a <S%H1995>tumult.<s%>

Now I, <S%H1840>Daniel,<s%> <S%H905>alone<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H4759>vision,<s%> while the <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were with me did not <S%H7200>see<s%> the <S%H4759>vision;<s%> <S%H61>nevertheless,<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2731>dread<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> on them, and they <S%H1272>ran<s%> <S%H1272>away<s%> to <S%H2244>hide<s%> themselves.

So I was <S%H7604>left<s%> <S%H905>alone<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4759>vision;<s%> yet <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3581>strength<s%> was <S%H7604>left<s%> in me, for my <S%H1935>natural<s%> <S%H1935>color<s%> <S%H2015>turned<s%> to a <S%H4889>deathly<s%> <S%H4889>pallor,<s%> and I <S%H6113>retained<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3581>strength.<s%>

But I <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of his <S%H1697>words;<s%> and as soon as I <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of his <S%H1697>words,<s%> I <S%H7290>fell<s%> into a <S%H7290>deep<s%> <S%H7290>sleep<s%> on my <S%H6440>face,<s%> with my <S%H6440>face<s%> to the <S%H776>ground.<s%>
Then <S%H2009>behold,<s%> a <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5060>touched<s%> me and <S%H5128>set<s%> me <S%H5128>trembling<s%> on my <S%H3709>hands<s%> <S%H3027><s%> and <S%H1290>knees.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said<s%> to me, "O <S%H1840>Daniel,<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H9143>high<s%> <S%H9143>esteem,<s%> <S%H995>understand<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> that I am about to <S%H1696>tell<s%> you and <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H5921>upright,<s%> <S%H5977><s%> for I have <S%H6258>now<s%> been <S%H7971>sent<s%> to you." And when he had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1697>word<s%> to me, I <S%H5975>stood<s%> up <S%H7460>trembling.<s%>

Then he <S%H559>said<s%> to me, "Do not be <S%H3372>afraid,<s%> <S%H1840>Daniel,<s%> for from the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> that you <S%H5414>set<s%> your <S%H3820>heart<s%> on <S%H995>understanding<s%> [this] and on <S%H6031>humbling<s%> yourself <S%H6440>before<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> your <S%H1697>words<s%> were <S%H8085>heard,<s%> and I have <S%H935>come<s%> in response to your <S%H1697>words.<s%>

"But the <S%H8269>prince<s%> of the <S%H4438>kingdom<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia<s%> was <S%H5975>withstanding<s%> me for <S%H259>twenty-one<s%> <S%H3117>days;<s%> then <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H4317>Michael,<s%> one of the <S%H7223>chief<s%> <S%H8269>princes,<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H5826>help<s%> me, for I had been <S%H3498>left<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> with the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia.<s%>

"Now I have <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H995>give<s%> you an <S%H995>understanding<s%> of <S%H834>what<s%> will <S%H7136>happen<s%> to your <S%H5971>people<s%> in the <S%H319>latter<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> for the <S%H2377>vision<s%> pertains to the <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H5750>yet<s%> [future.]"

And when he had <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to me according to <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words,<s%> I <S%H5414>turned<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%> toward the <S%H776>ground<s%> and <S%H481>became<s%> <S%H481>speechless.<s%>

And <S%H2009>behold,<s%> one <S%H1823>who<s%> <S%H1823>resembled<s%> a <S%H120>human<s%> <S%H1121>being<s%> <S%H120><s%> was <S%H5060>touching<s%> my <S%H8193>lips;<s%> then I <S%H6605>opened<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to him who was <S%H5975>standing<s%> <S%H5048>before<s%> me, "O my <S%H113>lord,<s%> as a result of the <S%H4759>vision<s%> <S%H9483>anguish<s%> has <S%H2015>come<s%> upon me, and I have <S%H6113>retained<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3581>strength.<s%>

"For <S%H1963>how<s%> <S%H3201>can<s%> <S%H2088>such<s%> a <S%H5650>servant<s%> of my <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H1696>talk<s%> with <S%H2088>such<s%> as my <S%H113>lord<s%>? As for me, there <S%H5975>remains<s%> just <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3581>strength<s%> in me, <S%H3808>nor<s%> has any <S%H5397>breath<s%> been <S%H7604>left<s%> in me."
Then [this] one with <S%H120>human<s%> <S%H4758>appearance<s%> <S%H5060>touched<s%> me <S%H3254>again<s%> and <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> me.

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> "O <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H9143>high<s%> <S%H9143>esteem,<s%> do not be <S%H3372>afraid.<s%> <S%H7965>Peace<s%> be with you; <S%H2388>take<s%> <S%H2388>courage<s%> and be <S%H2388>courageous!<s%>" Now as soon as he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to me, I <S%H2388>received<s%> <S%H2388>strength<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "May my <S%H113>lord<s%> <S%H1696>speak,<s%> for you have <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> me."

Then he <S%H559>said,<s%> "Do you <S%H3045>understand<s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> I <S%H935>came<s%> to you? But I shall <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> the <S%H8269>prince<s%> of <S%H6539>Persia;<s%> so I am <S%H3318>going<s%> <S%H3318>forth,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H8269>prince<s%> of <S%H3120>Greece<s%> is about to <S%H935>come.<s%>

<S%H61>"However,<s%> I will <S%H5046>tell<s%> you what is <S%H7559>inscribed<s%> in the <S%H3791>writing<s%> of <S%H571>truth.<s%> Yet <S%H369>there<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> who <S%H2388>stands<s%> <S%H2388>firmly<s%> with me <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> [forces] <S%H3588>except<s%> <S%H518><s%> <S%H4317>Michael<s%> your <S%H8269>prince.<s%>
